modShortDescription: A small mod that disables the crosshair while aiming guns, with and without item mods installed.
modDescription:
A small mod that disables the crosshair while aiming [guns](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), with and without item mods installed.

**Note:** This mod is server side only. Only the server needs to have it installed.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/Zilox/A20Modlets/-/archive/main/A20Modlets-main.zip?path=No%20Crosshair%20On%20Aim)**
